name: Otaku's Home
description:
This game is set in Japan, where you a new home owner need to clean out the clutter of the previous owner.  This Game was made by two people, a first year game development and design student as well as a second year graphic designer. I hope you enjoy it, any and all constructive comments are appreciated so that we can improve!

I just wanted to get a jump start on game development since we only start in unity next year XD
